channel.title: Need help with client extracting thing
channel.description: Well I found a nice client I wanna use for my server, but when I extract the client I only get the runserver.bat How do I fix so I can extract and get all the files? Btw I got windows Vista if that have something to say...

item.title: Need help with client extracting thing
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Seriously? Open the folder and go to tools -> Folder options -> View -> Find Hidden files and folders. Select it to show.
Now, select all of the folders and click properties. Unselect the hide and read only options.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with client extracting thing
